siteMetadata.title: Blog by Tableau Tim
siteMetadata.subtitle: Data, quantifiedself and everything in between.

frontmatter.title: Tableau Conference 2017: Las Vegas Roundup
frontmatter.description: A super brief roundup of 2017 conference. A little lighter than last years effort but mainly because in 2018, I'll be taking a slightly different approach to vlogging having claimed 2017 would be the year it would happen. Stay tuned and enjoy.

frontmatter.title: Step Line Chart in Tableau: Quick Tip
frontmatter.description: In this quick video, I summarise how to create a step line chart in Tableau.

frontmatter.title: Tableau Conference 2016 Austin Texas Roundup Vlog
frontmatter.description: Conference has long passed but as ever, it's never too late to reflect. I've put together a short video round up of my thoughts from conference in the last vlog from by Tableau conference Vlog series.

frontmatter.title: Tracking reference lines in Tableau (Quick Tip)
frontmatter.description: In the most recent #makeovermonday, I used a technique where the reference line is used to track your mouse across multiple charts. This is a quick post highlighting how to do this.

frontmatter.title: Tableau Hexbin Tutorial  (with hexbin shape pack)
frontmatter.description: I recently had the chance to work with some data from AirBnB. For the viz I built i just tried to use standard features and apply some AirBnb branding.
